parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Crossmember Cracking at Main Frame
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the front crossmember at the main frame can lead to structural integrity issues, potentially causing loss of control, accidents, or even vehicle collapse.
symptoms: Cracking or breaking of the front crossmember at the main frame

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tread Separation and Sidewall Cracks on Firestone SteelTex Radial R4S Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tread separation and sidewall cracks can lead to sudden tire failure, causing loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: and potential damage to the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater control switch can cause the heater system to malfunction, resulting in only cold air being emitted, which can lead to discomfort and reduced visibility due to fogging or icing of the windshield.
symptoms: The heater control switch does not function
only cold air comes out of the heater vents
the heater system does not produce warm air.
